channel.title: Maven on Sem Sinchenko
channel.description: Recent content in Maven on Sem Sinchenko

item.title: Supporting multiple Apache Spark versions with Maven
item.description: I recently had the opportunity to work on an open source project that implements a custom Apache Spark data source and associated logic for working with graph data. The code was written to work with Apache Spark 3.2.2. I am committed to extending support to multiple versions of Spark. In this blog post I want to show how the structure of such a project can be organized using Maven profiles.
